column1: 254422,Registered Nurse (Mental Health),,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals

column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column15: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column17: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column21: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column23: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column29: Confer with family members to discuss client treatment plans or progress
column31: Administer health care or medical treatments
column33: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column37: Care for patients with mental illnesses
column39: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column41: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column43: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column45: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column49: Design public or employee health programs
